titleStmt.title: An account how the Earl of Essex killed himself in the Tower of London, the 13th. of July 1683 As it appears by the coroners inquest, and the several informations following.
titleStmt.author: Farnham, E. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 4 by the coroner, E. Farnham.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
